trans-unit.source: Allows activity designer developers to add custom designer verb providers to an activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Permite que os desenvolvedores de designer de atividade adicionem provedores de verbo do designer personalizado a um designer de atividade.

trans-unit.source: Classes that implement this interface can add and remove custom verb providers--any classes that implement the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerVerbProvider> interface -- to and from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> classes.
trans-unit.target: Classes que implementam esta interface podem adicionar e remover provedores de verbo personalizado – todas as classes que implementam o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerVerbProvider> interface – em <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> classes.

trans-unit.source: Adds a class that implements the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerVerbProvider" /> interface to the list of verb providers that an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> uses.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona uma classe que implementa a interface de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerVerbProvider" /> à lista de provedores de verbo que um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> usa.

trans-unit.source: Removes a class that implements the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerVerbProvider" /> interface to the list of verb providers that an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> uses.
trans-unit.target: Remove uma classe que implementa a interface de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerVerbProvider" /> da lista de provedores de verbo que um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> usa.
Obtém uma coleção somente leitura de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerVerbProvider" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerVerbProviderService.VerbProviders%2A> returns an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerVerbProvider> collection that contains all verb providers associated with a specific <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerVerbProviderService.VerbProviders%2A> Retorna um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerVerbProvider> coleção que contém todos os provedores de verbo associados a um determinado <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>.
